sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {AiOutlineSetting} from 'react-icons/ai' import {IoSearch} from 'react-icons/io5' import NotificationDropdown from '../notification/NotificationDropdown' import SettingOption from './SettingOption' import { motion, AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion" import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import styles from './Header.module.css' import SearchResult from './SearchResult' import Avatar from '../util/Avatar' import OutsideClick from '../util/OutsideClick' import RsMenu from './RsMenu' function Header() { const [showNoti, setShowNoti] = useState(false) const [showSetting, setShowSetting] = useState(false) // responsive const [showSearch, setShowSearch] = useState(false) const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false) const [notiLength, setNotiLength] = useState() const {auth, notice} = useSelector(state=>state) useEffect(()=>{ const readNotices = notice.data.filter(noti=>noti.isRead.every(id=>id!=auth.user._id)); setNotiLength(readNotices.length) },[notice]) const isDesktop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 1224px)' }) return (
{isDesktop &&
}
{isDesktop ?
setShowSetting(!showSetting)} className={styles.setting_btn}>
:
setShowSearch(!showSearch)} className={styles.search_btn}>
}
setShowNoti(!showNoti)} className={styles.noti_btn}> {notiLength}
{isDesktop ?
:
setShowMenu(!showMenu)} className={styles.menu_btn}>
}
{showMenu && } {showSearch && } {showNoti && }
) } export default Header
